beauticonfig.suppressPlugins: beast.core.MCMC.operator, beast.evolution.tree.coalescent.Coalescent.treeIntervals, beast.evolution.tree.coalescent.Coalescent.tree, beast.core.MCMC.state, beast.core.MCMC.distribution, beast.core.MCMC.init, beast.evolution.speciation.BirthDeathGernhard08Model.relativeDeathRate, beast.evolution.speciation.BirthDeathGernhard08Model.treeIntervals, beast.evolution.speciation.BirthDeathGernhard08Model.type, beast.evolution.speciation.BirthDeathGernhard08Model.sampleProbability, beast.evolution.speciation.BirthDeathGernhard08Model.tree, beast.evolution.tree.RandomTree.trait, beast.util.TreeParser.initial, beast.util.TreeParser.taxa, beast.util.TreeParser.trait, beast.util.TreeParser.estimate, beast.util.ClusterTree.initial, beast.util.ClusterTree.taxa, beast.util.ClusterTree.trait, beast.util.ClusterTree.estimate, beast.evolution.substitutionmodel.WAG.rates, beast.evolution.substitutionmodel.WAG.frequencies, beast.evolution.substitutionmodel.GTR.rates, beast.evolution.substitutionmodel.JukesCantor.frequencies, beast.core.Operator.weight, beast.math.distributions.Prior.x, beast.math.distributions.MRCAPrior.tree, beast.math.distributions.MRCAPrior.monophyletic, beast.math.distributions.MRCAPrior.taxonset

panel.tiptext: Allows to specify data that a taxon was sampled
Site model and substitution model specifications

partitiontemplate.value:
<!-- site model --> <plugin spec='SiteModel' id="siteModel.$(n)" gammaCategoryCount='0'> <substModel spec='JukesCantor' id='JC69.$(n)'/> <proportionInvariant spec='parameter.RealParameter' id='proportionInvariant.$(n)' value='0.0' estimate='false'/> <mutationRate spec='parameter.RealParameter' id='mutationRate.$(n)' value='1.0' estimate='false'/> <shape spec='parameter.RealParameter' id='gammaShape.$(n)' value='1.0' estimate='false'/> </plugin>
<plugin spec='TreeLikelihood' id="treeLikelihood.$(n)"> <data idref="data"/> <tree idref="tree.$(n)"/> <siteModel idref="siteModel.$(n)"/> <branchRateModel spec='StrictClockModel' id='StrictClockModel.$(n)'> <clock.rate id='clockRate.$(n)' spec='parameter.RealParameter' value='1.0' estimate='false'/> </branchRateModel> </plugin>
<plugin spec='beast.evolution.tree.Tree' id='tree.$(n)' initial='@RandomTree.$(n)'> <trait id='datetrait.$(n)' spec='beast.evolution.tree.TraitSet' traitname='date' units='year' value=''> <taxa idref='data'/> </trait> </plugin> <plugin spec='beast.evolution.tree.RandomTree' id='RandomTree.$(n)' estimate='false' trait='@datetrait.$(n)'> <taxa spec='Alignment' idref='data'/> <populationModel id='ConstantPopulation.$(n)' spec='ConstantPopulation'> <popSize id='popSize.$(n)' spec='parameter.RealParameter' value='1'/> </populationModel> </plugin>
<plugin id='TreeHeight.$(n)' spec='beast.evolution.tree.TreeHeightLogger' tree='@tree.$(n)'/>
<plugin id='treelog.$(n)' spec='beast.core.Logger' logEvery="10000" fileName="beast.$(seed).trees"> <log idref="tree.$(n)"/> </plugin>
<plugin id='proportionInvariantScaler.$(n)' spec='ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.5" weight="1" parameter="@proportionInvariant.$(n)"/> <plugin id='mutationRateScaler.$(n)' spec='ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.5" weight="1" parameter="@mutationRate.$(n)"/> <plugin id='gammaShapeScaler.$(n)' spec='ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.5" weight="1" parameter="@gammaShape.$(n)"/> <plugin id='allTipDatesScaler.$(n)' spec='TipDatesScaler' scaleFactor="0.01" weight="0" tree="@tree.$(n)"/>
<plugin id='treeScaler.$(n)' spec='ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.5" weight="1" tree="@tree.$(n)"/> <plugin id='UniformOperator.$(n)' spec='Uniform' weight="10" tree="@tree.$(n)"/> <plugin id='SubtreeSlide.$(n)' spec='SubtreeSlide' weight="5" gaussian="true" size="1.0" tree="@tree.$(n)"/> <plugin id='narrow.$(n)' spec='Exchange' isNarrow='true' weight="1" tree="@tree.$(n)"/> <plugin id='wide.$(n)' spec='Exchange' isNarrow='false' weight="1" tree="@tree.$(n)"/> <plugin id='WilsonBalding.$(n)' spec='WilsonBalding' weight="1" tree="@tree.$(n)"/>
